Constructs a {{tt|chunk_by_view}}.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying data members via their respective default member initializers:
* the view {{rlpt|/#Data members|''base_''}} via {{c|1= = V()}},
* the binary predicate {{rlpt|/#Data members|''pred_''}} via {{c|1= = Pred()}}.

@2@ Move constructs the underlying data members:
* the view {{rlpt|/#Data members|''base_''}} with {{c|std::move(base)}},
* the binary predicate {{rlpt|/#Data members|''pred_''}} with {{c|std::move(pred)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|base|the view to split}}
{{par|pred|the function object (a binary predicate) used as a splitting criteria}}
{{par end}}
